# humind

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The package gives helpers to calculate usual humanitarian composite indicators in MSNAs.

* Expect many breaking changes as we are moving towards a more consistent and coherent package for 2024 MSNAs
* Food security indicators will be imported from impactR4PHU, potentially all Public Health functions.

## Installation

You can install the development version of humind like so:

``` r
devtools::install_github("impact-initiatives-hppu/humind")
```
